changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '/tmp/GrassChecklist.txt' INTO TABLE name FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n' (identifier, item);

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: UPDATE name SET identifier = concat('urn:kew.org:wcs:taxon:', identifier);

changeSet.author: ben
changeSet.sql: SELECT name.identifier, ifnull(name,''), ifnull(authorship,'') INTO OUTFILE '/tmp/taxon.txt' FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' LINES TERMINATED BY '\n' FROM grassbase.name LEFT JOIN uat.taxon ON (uat.taxon.identifier = grassbase.name.identifier);
